---
name: Tracker
about: For use in tracking large features
title: ""
labels: discussion, enhancement, tracker
assignees: ''

---

**Goals**
A clear and concise description of what the major goals for this feature are, what problems it addresses,
how it improves the framework, etc.

**Overview in Brief**
A write up describing the end results of the feature and what it would look like. Describe methodology and
how this feature will be implemented. 

**Features for Release**
A checklist of features needed to consider this feature done and ready for release.
